1.0.name: wordpress/hu-permalinks
1.0.description: This plugin will change the hungarian letters with accents to simple letters in the permalink, so the permalinks will be clean adresses and just good to be indexed by search engine robots. The plugin cleans also the symbols written with hungarian keyboards.
